bibl.title: Preliminary Remarks on the Prosopography of the Petra Papyri. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The family relations of the main character of the Petra papyri, Theodoros son of Obodianos, and his personal chronology.

bibl.title: Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II

bibl.seg: LEHTINEN Marjo, Preliminary Remarks on the Prosopography of the Petra Papyri. Avec résumé en anglais.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II (Firenze, 2001) pp. 787-794, 1 tabl., 1 arbre généal.
The family relations of the main character of the Petra papyri, Theodoros son of Obodianos, and his personal chronology.
